title: 2015 CSMC Problem PartA #6
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Suppose that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"X"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are angles with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\tan X = \\frac 1m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\tan Y = \\frac an"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for some positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Determine the number of positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a \\leq 50"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for which there are exactly "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pairs of positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(m, n)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"X + Y = 45º"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This question seems to be a trigonometry question but it is actually a number theory question "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
//===== "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
If I am to take a theoretical guess the answer would be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"12"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", since there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pairs and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" values ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\tan X"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\tan Y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2 \times 6 = 12"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
//====="},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"text","text":"Legit Solution Starts Here","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":".\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\tan (X+Y) = \tan 45º"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\tan(X+Y) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac {\tan X + \tan Y}{1-\tan X + \tan Y} = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 = \frac {\frac 1m + \frac an}{1 - \frac {a}{mn}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
Simplify and get: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0 = am + a+n-nm"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Rearrange and get
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+a = m(n-a)-(n-a)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a = (m-1)(n-a)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\because m \neq 1, m-1 > 0, 2a > 0 \quad \therefore n>a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":".\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
Using "},{"type":"text","text":"variable substitution","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m - 1 = r > 0, n-a = s > 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a = r \cdot s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\because 2a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" factorizations "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(r, s, rs)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\therefore "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" it has "},{"type":"text","text":"3!=63! = 63!=6 positive divisors","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":".\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
By "},{"type":"text","text":"Fudemental Theorem of Arithmetic","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
Given integer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and its "},{"type":"text","text":"prime factorizations","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d = p_1^{c_1} \times p_2^{c_2} \times  p_3^{c_3} \times ... \times p_k^{c_k}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_1, p_2, ... p_k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are distinct prime number and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c_1, c_2, ... c_k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are positive integers. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":".\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
By Basic "},{"type":"text","text":"Counting","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" Technique "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
The "},{"type":"text","text":"number of positive divisor","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(c_1 + 1)(c_2 + 1) ... (c_k + 1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which is "},{"type":"text","text":"6","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
In order for this product to equal to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must have the form "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p^5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" [Facorizations are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(c+1) = 6 \Rightarrow c = 5, d = p^{c}  = p^5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"] "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
or the form "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_1^2 \cdot p_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for some "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"prime numbers"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":".\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
By "},{"type":"text","text":"Property of Composite Numbers","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is of the form "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p^5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p = 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is already divisible by 2 and we can only pick one prime number. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
Thus "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a = 2^5 = 32"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 16"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":".\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is of the form "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_1^2 \cdot p_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" p = 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"q = 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" [as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must be one factorization for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"]. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a < 50"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_1 = 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a = 4 \cdot p_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a \leq 50"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a \leq 100"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_2 \leq 25"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can equal "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17, 19, 23"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" giving "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 6, 10, 14, 22, 26, 34, 38, 48 (p_2 \neq 2)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_2 = 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a = 2p_1^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" since  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2a \leq 100"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_1^2 \leq 50"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and so the prime "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p_1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can equal to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3, 5, 7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" giving "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 9, 25, 49 (p_1 \neq 2)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":".\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
There fore, in summary, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{12}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" possible "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Base on the official solution by University of Waterloo","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"text","text":"All Credit Goes to University of Waterloo","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"First,notice that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015^2\equiv 0\pmod{2015}\\-(2014)^2\equiv -1\pmod{2015},1^2\equiv 1\pmod{2015}\\
2013^2\equiv 2^2\equiv 4\pmod{2015},-(2^2)\equiv -4\pmod{2015}\\
-(2012^2)\equiv -3^2\equiv-9\pmod{2015},3^2\equiv 9\pmod{2015}\\.\\.\\.\\.\\
-(1008^2)\equiv -(1007)^2\pmod{2015},1007^2\equiv1007^2\pmod{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" .When we add all the above expressions we have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015^2-2014^2+2013^2........+3^2-2^2+1^2\equiv 0\pmod{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2015 is coming!
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/solvable/17d52e7b82.9cdda67ded.NzbqRJ.gif"}},{"type":"text","text":"
If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac { { a }_{ 1 } }{ { a }_{ 2 }+{ a }_{ 3 }+...+{ a }_{ 2015 } } +\frac { { a }_{ 2 } }{ { a }_{ 1 }+{ a }_{ 3 }+...+{ a }_{ 2015 } } +\frac { { a }_{ 3 } }{ { a }_{ 1 }+{ a }_{ 2 }+{ a }_{ 4 }+...+{ a }_{ 2015 } } +...+\frac { { a }_{ 2014 } }{ { a }_{ 1 }+{ a }_{ 2 }+...+{ a }_{ 2013 }+{ a }_{ 2015 } } +\frac { { a }_{ 2015 } }{ { a }_{ 1 }+{ a }_{ 2 }+...+{ a }_{ 2014 } } \ge K"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"K"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Details and assumptions:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ a }_{ 1 },{ a }_{ 2 },...,{ a }_{ 2014 },{ a }_{ 2015 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are positive real numbers."}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Give your answer to 4 decimals"}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem was  inspired by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Nesbitt.......no"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" by Kristian Vasilev"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{1}  \geq a_{2} \geq a_{3} \geq a_{4} ................\geq a_{2015} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By this  "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \dfrac{1}{a_{2}+a_{3}+a_{4}+  ....+a_{2015}} \geq \dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{3}+a_{4}+ ... +a_{2015}} \geq \dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{2}+ a_{4} ...... +a_{2015 }} ... \geq \dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}  ...+a_{2014}} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Apply "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Re-arrangement inequality "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to get 
  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2014 ( \dfrac{1}{a_{2}+a_{3}+a_{4}+...+a_{2015}}+ \dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{3}+a_{4}+...+a_{2015}} + \dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{2}+ a_{4}...+a_{2015}}...+\dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}...+a_{2014}} ) \geq 2015(\dfrac{a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}+...+a_{2015}}{a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}+...+a_{2015}} )"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{1}{a_{2}+a_{3}+a_{4}+ ...+a_{2015}}+ \dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{3}+a_{4}+ ...+a_{2015} }+ \dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{2}+ a_{4} ...+a_{2015} }...+\dfrac{1}{a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}...+a_{2014}} \geq \dfrac{2015}{2014}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By this "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"K=\dfrac{2015}{2014}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Generalizing the question, we get
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\huge\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n} \left( \dfrac{a_i}{\left( \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n} a_i \right) - a_i} \right) \geq\dfrac{n}{n-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Nice!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \displaystyle \sum_{1}^{2015} = x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \dfrac{a_{1}}{x - a_{1}} + \dfrac{a_{2}}{x - a_{2}} + .... + \dfrac{a_{2015}}{x - a_{2015}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \dfrac{x}{x - a_{1}} - 1 + \dfrac{x}{x - a_{2}} - 1 + .. \dfrac{x}{x - a_{2015}} - 1 = \displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^{2015}( \dfrac{x}{x - a_{i}} - 1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \displaystyle \dfrac{\sum_{i=1}^{2015} \dfrac{x}{x - a_{i}}}{2015} \geq \dfrac{2015}{ \displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^{2015} \dfrac{x - a_{i}}{x}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \displaystyle \dfrac{\sum_{i=1}^{2015} \dfrac{x}{x - a_{i}}}{2015} \geq \dfrac{2015x}{2014x}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \displaystyle \sum_{i=1}^{2015} (\dfrac{x}{x - a_{i}} -1)  \geq \dfrac{2015}{2014}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"if we exchange any "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{i}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with any "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{j}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the sum value will be same.
So the sum is symmetric and the minimum occurs when all "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{i}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s are same.
which gives 2015/2014."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

                                            It isn't necessary that minimum in a symmetric function/sum will always occur when all the variables are same.
